item.name: APIGEE AUTH API

request.description: Get access token by providing consumer APIGEE key and secret.

item.description: Get access token by providing consumer APIGEE key and secret.

item.name: Trading Partner New

body.raw:
{
    "requestTitle": "Test External API | TP New | {{todayDate}}",
    "usersToNotify": "user1@example.com;user2@example.com",
    "requestNotes": "string",
    "workOrders": [
        {
            "workOrderTitle": "Ext API | TP New WO - ANSI | {{todayDate}}",
            "workOrderType": "Trading Partner - New",
            "connectivityType": "AS2",
            "tpCompanyName": "TP API Company",
            "prodContactEmailAddress": "test@test.test",
            "prodContactFirstName": "API_FN",
            "prodContactLastName": "API_LN",
            "prodContactPhoneNumber": "11111",
            "isProdTestDetailsSame": false,
            "testContactEmailAddress": "test1@test.test",
            "testContactFirstName": "API_FN1",
            "testContactLastName": "API_LN1",
            "testContactPhoneNumber": "22222",
            "addressLineOne": "TestAddrss1",
            "addressLineTwo": "TestAddrss2",
            "city": "TestCity",
            "postalCode": "1234",
            "state": "TestState",
            "country": "IN",
            "notes": "Externalizing API - Testing in QA - TP New WO Type",
            "additionalServices": ["ACTIVE_INTELLIGENCE","ACTIVE_INVOICE_COMPLIANCE","CARBON_COPY"],
            "abc":"abc",
            "efg": "efg",
            "ediStandardDetails": [
                {
                    "standardType": "ANSI_X12",
                    "yourISAId": "yourISAId",
                    "yourISAQualifier": "AB",
                    "yourProdGSId": "yourProdGSId",
                    "tpISAId": "tpISAId",
                    "tpISAQualifier": "CD",
                    "tpProdGSId": "tpProdGSId",
                    "yourTestISAQualifier": "EF",
                    "yourTestISAId": "yourTestISAId",
                    "yourTestGSId": "yourTestGSId",
                    "tpTestGSId": "tpTestGSId",
                    "tpTestISAId": "tpTestISAId",
                    "tpTestISAIndicator": false,
                    "tpTestISAQualifier": "GH",
                    "requireFA": true,
                    "elementSeparator": "FOUR",
                    "segmentTerminator": "DEFAULT",
                    "subElementSeparator": "DOLLAR",
                    "yourTestISAIndicator": false,
                    "selectedMaps": [
                        {
                            "documentType": "Test ANSI_X12 Map",
                            "map": "ANSI_X12 Map Name",
                            "direction": "INBOUND"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
